metadata.name: Wilting
metadata.description:
Wilting is an abstract, browser-based artwork by Andrew Benson,  rendered live with WebGL and HTML5 Canvas elements, texture/shader feedback, and simulated cloth dynamics.

This work was created with support from the FWB x OpenSea collaboration and first exhibited at FWB Fest 2022 in Idyllwild, CA.  
 
To view full page --> 
https://pixlpa.com/wilting  
via ARWeave -->  
https://arweave.net/aLBnp7BdMkteUyTCz7iVjWQZLpEEHtV0MJZuNKtFfWs

Note: Exact appearance of this dynamically generated work may vary depending on several factors including browser/display resolution.
